About

I'm a creator. It's as simple as that. I'm currently in high school, dreaming of becoming an interactive developer and influencing the world someday. If you feel the same way, I think you're pretty cool.

This is where I post mainly about code, mathematics, and physics. I'm also an avid filmmaker, so news about that may sneak its way in here as well.

Developers that inspire me:

  • Mr. Doob
  • Paul Irish
  • Hakim El Hattab
  • Tom Preston-Werner
  • Seb Lee Delisle
